column1: Hi, my internet is not working.
I paid the bill but it's still showing due.
I want to change my plan to premium.
My connection is very slow since yesterday.
Please send me a copy of my last invoice.
I'm not able to make a payment using UPI.
Can someone help me upgrade to the Gold package?
Channels are missing from my subscription.
I was charged twice for the same bill.
I would like to cancel my subscription.
My device is overheating and not working properly.
Can you help me change my registered email ID?
I'm not receiving any OTP on my number.
I want to know about your family plan options.
